title: Emerald Rose-Cut Diamond Jhumka - Vaiduryam Vakralu
materials: SI Clarity. Features authentic Hyderabadi Polish.
features: Classic Jhumka design with a contemporary twist. Showcases a stunning, pear-shaped emerald framed by meticulously set rose-cut diamonds (Polki). The intricate gold detailing features a delicate, textured border around both the emerald and the top diamond component. The design captures the essence of traditional Telugu craftsmanship while maintaining a sleek, modern aesthetic. Secure screw-back closure ensures comfortable wear.
occasions: and upscale social events. Also suitable for adding a touch of regal elegance to contemporary outfits.
description: This Jhumka embodies timeless elegance, seamlessly blending traditional South Indian design with modern sensibilities. The vibrant emerald represents prosperity and new beginnings, making it a meaningful piece for significant life events. The Hyderabadi Polish gives the gold a lustrous finish that enhances the brilliance of the diamonds and emerald. A truly exquisite piece that will be treasured for generations.
